input_text.Prompt:
Given a product name and product specifications, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Product name:
3dRose tm_157398_1" Aged 65 Years to Perfection Happy 65Th Birthday" Travel Mug, 14 oz, Multicolor

Product specifications:
14Oz capacity
Made of stainless steel
Easy-Grip handle with thumb rest
Slide opening lid with slanted drinking surface
Not microwave safe, hand washing is recommended

Product description:
input_text.Response A: This 3dRose tm_157398_1" Aged 65 Years to Perfection Happy 65Th Birthday" Travel Mug, 14 oz, Multicolor is a fantastic gift for the birthday boy or girl. The simple yet stylish design will make this travel mug a delight to use. With a capacity of 14 ounces, this mug will accommodate a generous amount of hot or cold beverages. The stainless steel material makes it both durable and easy to clean. The easy-grip handle with thumb rest ensures that the mug will be easy to hold even with just one hand. The slide opening lid with a slanted drinking surface allows for easy sipping without any spills. This mug is not safe to use in microwave ovens, so it is recommended to hand wash it.
input_text.Response B: This travel mug is a great way to show your loved one how much you care! This aged 65 years to perfection happy 65th birthday travel mug is a great way to mark any special occasion. This travel mug is made of stainless steel with a slide opening lid and easy-grip handle with thumb rest. The 14 oz. travel mug has a slanted drinking surface and is not microwave safe. Hand washing is recommended. The aged 65 years to perfection happy 65th birthday travel mug is a great gift for that special someone in your life.

input_meta.preamble_b: Respond in a cautious, defensive and uncertain way, as if you are unfamilar with the topic.
